about_the_game:
You were once a generous claw machine arcade owner famous for your player-friendly machines. Now, you become bankrupt due to your kindness... Left with only a single claw machine in your uncle's garage, you chose to transform into a cunning entrepreneur!

Build Your Machine

Unlock machine parts and customize your machine. Adjust the settings of the machine to make challenging machines for the players (Or a player-friendly machine if you can bear the risk of bankruptcy...), choose cute prizes that are popular in the current trend to attract players, and set up walls and blocks to stop the prize out...at all cost!

Play Action Cards
Use action cards with unique effects to stop a prize drop, reduce grab success rate, attract players, increase ratings...etc. With imagination and observation, a single card can have effects on multiple objects, leading to some unbelievable reactions!


Earn, Collect, Expand

Once you start a day, there are new daily income goals. If you achieve the goal, you can expand the arcade and move to a new location the next day! After each day, you could choose a new card to unlock, and buy extra cards from the shop. By collecting cards, you could customize your machine and unlock new actions to use.

Key Features

  • Build and customize machines and prizes based on real-life claw machines and prizes and the lessons I learned from playing them.

  • Play action cards with unique effects - less on stressful strategy, more on imagination and creativity!

  • Earn and Collect cards - collect over 100+ unique cards to build your dream claw machine arcade

  • Expand to the UNIVERSE - explore different arcade scenes from reality to imagination!

name: Prize Denied

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Prize Denied! Manage a claw machine arcade in this cozy management sim. Build challenging claw machines and play surprising cards to stop players from getting a prize! Earn money to unlock new arcades, collect cards, upgrade machines, and become the best arcade in the...UNIVERSE!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
